name: Kolab Landing Page
description:
Hello Everyone,

Here is my exploration for the landing page for Kolab a Visual Collaboration platform for every team.Whether your teams are colocated, distributed, or fully remote, Kolab provides an engaging, intuitive, in-person collaboration experience. Kolab helps to create, collaborate and centralise communication across company.


Feel free to use it in your projects.

👉 Comment your thoughts & tag your friends.

👊 Smash the ❤️ button if you like it.

😇 Follow our dribbble page for such amazing designs.
